thread.title: Arsenal transfer news: Juventus have already decided to bid for Alexis Sanchez | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal transfer news: Juventus have already decided to bid for Alexis Sanchez | Metro News

author: Coral Barry For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal transfer news: Juventus have already decided to bid for Alexis Sanchez | Metro News
text:
Juventus director Beppe Marotta has already sanctioned move for Arsenal star Alexis Sanchez gossip Coral Barry for Metro.co.uk Sunday 12 Feb 2017 12:43 pm Alexis Sanchez is in talks to sign a new contract at Arsenal (Picture: Getty) 
Juventus have already decided that they will bid for Arsenal star Alexis Sanchez , according to reports in Italy. Mesut Ozil suffering CRISIS of confidence, admits Arsenal boss Wenger 
Sanchez is currently locked in negotiations with Arsenal over a new contract, but has yet to sign a new deal despite months of talks. 
Mesut Ozil is another Arsenal star who has yet to put pen to paper, sparking concern both attackers could be considering summer exits. 
The situation over Sanchez’s contract has alerted the attentions of several Serie A clubs and Juventus have already put together a summer bid. Arsenal fixtures 
Bayern Munich – Champions League (A) – Wed 15 Feb Sutton – FA Cup (A) – weekend of 17/18 Feb Liverpool (A) – Sat 4 Mar Bayern Munich – Champions League (H) – Tue 7 Mar Leicester (H) – Sat 11 Mar West Brom (A) – Sat 18 Mar Manchester City (H) – Sat 1 Apr West Ham (H) – Tue 4 Apr Sanchez got a brace in Arsenal’s win on Saturday (Picture: Getty) 
Juventus director Beppe Marotta is convinced his side can land club Sanchez, according to Corriere dello Sport. 
Arsene Wenger has repeatedly assured fans that Sanchez will sign a new deal and has refused to be drawn into speculation about his future. Beppe Marotta has already sanctioned a summer move for Sanchez (Picture: Getty)
